subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Oakland’s Bartolo Colon had a shutout through eight innings, but Matt Wieters’s two-run double tied the score, 2-2, and set the stage for Wilson Betemit.
snippet: Oakland’s Bartolo Colon had a shutout through eight innings, but Matt Wieters’s two-run double tied the score, 2-2, and set the stage for Wilson Betemit.
